author: @4ian, Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
name: PhysicsEllipseMovement3D
shortDescription: Move objects on ellipses or smoothly back and forth in one direction.
description: - smoothly vertically or horizontally (by setting one radius to 0)
- on a sine wave (by adding a force)
- Making objects float, such as powerups or coins
- Making a player constantly turn right or left ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://star-seeker))

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move objects on ellipses or smoothly back and forth in one direction.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PhysicsEllipseMovement3D

events.comment: Evaluate the center of movement from the object position and properties.
Ensure the object doesn't drift away.
Ensure the object doesn't drift away.
Ensure the object doesn't drift away.
Update the movement angle for the next frame.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is turning left.
eventsFunctions.name: IsTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Change the in which side the object is turning (left or right).
eventsFunctions.name: SetTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Change the turning direction (left or right).
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement angle of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MovementAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Change the movement angle. The object is teleported according to the angle.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMovementAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement center position on X axis.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterV

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement center position on Y axis.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterH

eventsFunctions.description: the ellipse width of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Width

eventsFunctions.description: the ellipse height of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Height
SetLoopDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the loop duration of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_
